title: Program for Enhancing Self-Directed Learning Competencies and Fostering a Culture of Information Sharing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning competencies and fundamental job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Course for Cultivating Self-Directed Learning Habits and Collaborative Information-Sharing Attitudes in Practice-Centered Language Learning Environments

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can improve their learning competencies by over 20% using the Self-Directed Learning Readiness (SDLR) diagnostic tool
By the course conclusion, learners achieve weekly information-sharing frequency with peers and can explain that their sharing motivation is to support others' growth
Learners can systematically classify and utilize at least three weekly work-related language materials collected via mobile platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
